document.full_text: an online auction of "unabomber" ted kaczynski's personal belongings generated $232,246 to compensate his victims and their families, the u.s. marshals service said on friday.
document.title: "unabomber" auction raises over $232,000
lines_and_colors: an online auction of "unabomber" ted kaczynski's personal belongings generated $232,246 to compensate his victims and their families, the u.s. marshals service said on friday.
